translation: to do, to make, to be up to
to have, to have got, ain't (has not), ain't (have not)
to think, to mention, to say, to suggest, to tell, to speak
to come, to come back, to come over
can, to be able, could, to branch, to be allowed, to couldn't, might, may
to make, to put on, to put
must, to ought, ought to, shall, should, to owe
to leave, to allow, to let, to abandon, to drop off, to leave off, to ditch, to forsake
to leave, to get out, to go out
